June – October 2015: IWCC, Ryde and Sandown Libraries
Digital Champion

Duties

Assist customers with computers.
Help customers with any Internet queries.
I used ItsMyPc software for reserving time on computers.
I used ItsMyPc software for authorizing printing.
One to one computer tuition.
Appointments made via telephone.
Assist customers complete online council applications.

April- June 2015: DWP Ryde Job Centre
Digital Assistant

Duties

Help run the daily job clubs.
Print out new jobs from various web sites and maintain job category files.
Assist job seekers set up mandatory government account.
Assist job seekers set up accounts with employment agencies.
Assist job seekers set up email accounts.
Assist job seekers cteate CV's and cover letters.
Assist job seekers complete online job applications.
